oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Technologische Alternativen zum herkömmlichen Einsatz von Pökelstoffen in Öko-Fleischwaren
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Beck, A.
Marx, B.
Lücke, F.-K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On the basis of literature research and opinions of meat processors and other experts, this paper discusses alternatives to the currently permitted use of curing agents in the processing of organic meat. These alternatives include (i) the reduction of addition of nitrite to levels sufficient for the desired sensory properties, (ii) the in situ bacterial formation of nitrite from nitrate naturally present in added vegetable preparations, and (iii) not making use of the beneficial effects of nitrite on the colour and aroma of the product at all. Measures to be taken to compensate for the effects of nitrite, as well as problems in implementation of technological alternatives are discussed.
